Caching

  • cache-money gem to handle AR caching

Dev Setup

  • You will need to install memcached (you can also install a cluster of these).
  • Then update your /lib/initializers/biocat_local.rb with caching settings from /lib/initializers/biocat_local.rb.pre
  • Copy /config/memcache.yml.pre to /config/memcache.yml and configure accordingly

Info

cache-money

  • http://magicscalingsprinkles.wordpress.com/2008/12/11/introducing-cache-money/

Misc

  • http://thewebfellas.com/blog/2008/6/9/rails-2-1-now-with-better-integrated-caching
  • http://guides.rubyonrails.org/caching_with_rails.html
  • http://www.jefdean.com/2008/7/5/rails-cache-memcached-development-mode-and-offline-cache-invalidation

Clearing Caches

To clear page and fragment caches: 

rake tmp:cache:clear RAILS_ENV=production

To clear memcached: 

rake cache:clear_memcache RAILS_ENV=production
